instruction: Design a billboard advertisement for a mobile game.
output: A billboard advertisement for the mobile game Galactic Wars could feature an exciting scene of space combat with a tagline such as "Embark on a thrilling adventure in the depths of outer space!" or "Entice your thrill-seeking side with Galactic Wars!" The advertisement could also focus on the features of the game such as exciting galactic battles and amazing graphics, with a tagline like "Experience galactic battles like never before!" or "Take your gaming experience to a whole new level!"
